sentences.en: But their arrogance and their cultured voices masked guilt and fear.
sentences.cn: 然尔,他们的自高自大和富有教养的声调却掩盖着内疚和恐惧.

sentences.en: He went to the masked ball without masking his face.
sentences.cn: 他去参加化装舞会而没戴假面具.

sentences.en: Her eyes were masked by huge round sunglasses.
sentences.cn: 她的双眼被一副圆形大墨镜遮住了.

sentences.en: His defense, which seems credible on the evidence so far, is that the bank masked its skullduggery so completely that no regulator anywhere in the world could get a handle on it.
sentences.cn: 他的辩词(根据目前证据似乎可信)是:银行把它的偷天换日的做法遮掩得天衣无逢,全世界任何地方的监管人员都无法掌握.

sentences.en: Masked gunmen opened fire on the bus.
sentences.cn: 蒙面的持枪歹徒朝公共汽车开了枪。

sentences.en: Masked men held up a security van in South London yesterday.
sentences.cn: 蒙面歹徒昨天在伦敦南部抢劫了一辆护卫车.

sentences.en: Masked robbers broke in and made off with $8,000.
sentences.cn: 蒙面抢匪破门而入，偷走了8,000美元。

sentences.en: Masked robbers broke in, tied him up, and made off with $8,000.
sentences.cn: 几个蒙面大盗破门而入，把他捆起来，抢走了8,000美元。

sentences.en: The growth of certain viruses is masked by faster growing ones.
sentences.cn: 某些病毒的生长可以被生长更快的病毒所掩蔽.

sentences.en: The thief masked his face with a stocking.

sentences.cn: 他们遮盖了他们的真正意图.

sentences.en: They were taken captive by masked gunmen.
sentences.cn: 他们被蒙面的持枪歹徒劫持了。

sentences.en: Three masked bandits stuck up a bank yesterday.
sentences.cn: 三个蒙面盗匪昨天抢劫了一家银行.

sentences.en: Two alleged collaborators were shot dead by masked activists.
sentences.cn: 两名涉嫌通敌者被蒙面的激进分子击毙。

sentences.en: Two masked men held up a mail van.
sentences.cn: 两个戴面具的人拦路抢劫了一辆邮车.

words.tran_cn: 蒙面者；化装舞蹈者；戴假面具的人
戴面具；掩饰；化装（mask的ing形式）
戴面具；掩饰；使模糊（mask的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 戴面具的，化妆的，隐蔽的，[医]潜伏的，不明的
伪装，mask的过去式和过去分词
